question.title: How to read a MIFARE badge to retrieve the UID key, in Android Studio Java
question.body:
I'm developping a function in my app to read a MIFARE badge,with a NFC Reader which is present on my phone, but I have to search and I never find a thing about it. who is able to purpose an algorythme in Java, maybe with the API's of android studio if its necessary, to retrieve an UID key of a MIFARE badge. Thank's a lot.

i don't now how to make this.
